name: Akasa Air - India's AMAZING low cost airline (with 21 USD first class seats??)
description:
Get an exclusive Surfshark deal! Enter promo code WINGINIT for an extra 3 months free at https://surfshark.deals/winginit

Akasa Air delivered arguably the best budget airline experience I've ever had. By a trick of fate they have temporarily ended up with an aircraft with first class seats, and for a modest upgrade...you can sit there! Their 737MAX was a fine way to travel between Delhi and Bombay and the unexpectedly personal service and affordable catering left a big impression on me. Even without the big seats, this is an airline hoping to impress and expand, and I'm excited to see what happens with this smart new airline in the years ahead.
